app_info

Class CarInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • app_info.CarInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CarInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    CarInfo class represents information about Car, shared across the application. It contains a list of OptionSetInfos, and each of them contains a list of OptionInfos.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
